name: DEVIL CATCHER!
description:
This game is made for the Game By Its Cover 2021,inspired by the art cover of :

Daniela Riveros ｜ Illustrator 

https://famicase.com/21/
Credits also to Liz Matin for the music and sound effects they provided!
I did the art and coding on this and the gameplay was mostly inspired by Ape escape which I tried to reimagine in 2D
